entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
